thread.title: Leah

author: Leah
title: Leah
text: I found your store the first time by googling "gluten free ranch dressing" and there you were in Amazon. Although VERY expensive, I ordered four bags of your dressing. WONDERFUL!! But my house keeper "hid" my last two bags and I couldn't find them. I googled the same name thing again. Nada. Zilch. Nothing. I eventually found my last two bags and now have a Cade of your dressing, five of which I have in my purse! And, you are bookmarked on my calendar computer! Oh glorious day!!!
